MeasurementToolMetadata.Description:
Goldsmiths Musical Sophistication Index

Reference:
Selected from Müllensiefen, D., Gingras, B., Musil, J., Stewart, L. (2014). The Musicality of Non-Musicians: An Index for Assessing Musical Sophistication in the General Population. PLoS ONE 9(2): e89642. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0089642

 Assessing '… musical skills and behaviours on multiple dimensions…' (Müllensiefen et al., 2014, page e101091).
